name: Skyline Attack
description:
Back of Box - Commodore 64 (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

In this dramatic arcade game, which stretches the Commodore 64 to its limits, you have to fly your craft across incredibly realistic outlines of the world's major cities and defend them against the aliens.

Jeremy San, Fouad Katan and Andrew Glaister are three of the top names in microcomputing software and they have joined forces to produce probably the best ever arcade game for the Commodore 64.
